allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(tui\): replace cview with Bubble Tea and lipgloss

- Replace cview-based TUI with Bubble Tea framework
- Add lipgloss for styling with theme adapter
- Implement menu system with keyboard shortcuts
- Preserve header layout with hostname, flags, and version info
- Add screen navigation with back support
- Create reusable menu and dialog components
- Fix theme validation to use .ds2theme extension

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
